name: PATCHES
description:
TO LIMIT MOTION SICKNESS PLEASE PLAY SITTING DOWN

As a child you used to dream of the day that you are grown up enough to stay alone in the house. Luckily, your parents have taken notice and decided to leave you alone for the first time.  You notice some of your old stuffed animals that your mother thew away have come back, but this time they seek revenge! Although you tried to warn your parents of their return,  they refuse to believe you. Armed with a camera and a flashlight, you must take action. It's up to you to stay up and gather enough evidence to convince your parents not to leave you alone for the weekend. With the little film you have take photos of your old stuff animals while trying not to wake your parents.

Fail and  risk finding out the real reason why your old stuffed animals  decided to come back.

Requirements:

Oculus VR Headset and controllers

Controls:

Left thumb stick- move

Right thumb stick - rotate player

Left thumb stick (press) - sprint

A button - switch between objects

Camera Controls

Left trigger - take a photo

Use hand finger -  press button on camera to reload

Shakelight controls:

Shake Right Remote - power up shakelight
